definition: to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
to replace the old with new/to renew/to renovate/to upgrade/to update/to regenerate
to replace (a worn-out tire etc)/to change (one's address etc)
to take over (from one another)/to alternate/to replace/to relay

sentences.english: As soon as you prove to be good, you will get more followers.
sentences.chinese: 如果事实证明你还不错，必定会有更多追随者。

sentences.english: Still, I'd like to see more innovation in content aggregators on the iPad.
sentences.chinese: 我依旧想在iPad内容聚合器上看到更多的创新。

sentences.english: More responsive page rendering using lazy frame construction.
sentences.chinese: 更多的反应型页面渲染使用懒人框架结构。

sentences.english: A happy family is much more important than money.
sentences.chinese: 幸福家庭比金钱更重要。

sentences.english: And the big money is with the brand advertisers.
sentences.chinese: 而且大品牌广告商拥有更多的广告费用。

sentences.english: More dramatic is the introduction of goal-driven search engine marketing campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 更戏剧性的是，目标驱动的搜索引擎营销活动的介绍。

sentences.english: AS the Nomogram was made, it provided a more simple and convenient method for estimating the lean yield.
sentences.chinese: 列线图的制作为估算瘦肉量提供了更简便的方法。

sentences.english: And today his campaign expects more super delegates will be announcing their support for Obama. Mara Liasson, NPR News, Washington.
sentences.chinese: 今天在竞选中他期待更多超级代表的选票。

sentences.english: Edgars says it is beautiful palace - but that “Riga is better”.
sentences.chinese: 埃德加说这是一座美丽的宫殿，但是里加更美丽。

sentences.english: You want to know more about Ili?
sentences.chinese: 你想更多地了解伊犁啊？

sentences.english: And light multitaskers might be better at preserving their attention.
sentences.chinese: 并且轻度的一心多用者可能更擅长保持注意力。

sentences.english: Who speaks words that are lovelier than those of Jesus?
sentences.chinese: 有谁说的话比耶稣更动听？

sentences.english: It has dignity and self-love stronger than mine.
sentences.chinese: 它的尊严与自爱比我的更强烈。

sentences.english: An airbag that deploys a second later than it should is worse than no airbag at all.
sentences.chinese: 晚一秒钟展开气囊比没有气囊的情况更糟糕。

sentences.english: This sheeting has excellent entrance angularity, which is typical of encapsulated lens glass bead sheeting.
sentences.chinese: 具有更优秀的入射角，这也正是玻璃微珠的优势所在。

sentences.english: Later, those boats were heavily outrun by modern ships.
sentences.chinese: 稍后，那些船很重地根据现代船跑得更快。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
